s3games.gui

Class CameraWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.gui.ControlWindow
      • s3games.gui.CameraWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class CameraWindow
extends ControlWindow
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A simple control window for letting the user control when to snap the current game state on the real board using the camera.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CameraWindow(Camera camera)
      construct and show the camera control window

      buttons action listener
      protected void addButtonsToPanel(javax.swing.JPanel panel)
      configure the buttons on the panel of the window - camera panel is simple containing only the SNAP and CLEAR actions
      void close()
      closing camera control panel window
      void moving(boolean b)
      request the camera snapping to be allowed or not
